snippet: Radek Stepanek of the Czech Republic will play David Ferrer of Spain in the opening singles match of the 100th Davis Cup final Friday in Prague.
abstract: Radek Stepanek of Czech Republic will face David Ferrer of Spain in opening singles match of the 100th Davis Cup final in Prague; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Radek Stepanek of the Czech Republic will play David Ferrer of Spain in the opening singles match of the 100th Davis Cup final Friday in Prague.
